p: Based on the IC 50 values, the EOs extracted by MAE method showed a slightly higher phytotoxic activity than those extracted by HD method ( Figure 2). However, the EO extracted using the MAE method from T. decussatus showed a higher inhibitory effect than T. polium by 16-, 32-, and 24-fold, regarding the seed germination, shoot growth, and root growth of lettuce, respectively. Moreover, the EO extracted by HD showed a similar pattern with a 16-, 28-, and 14-fold change, respectively ( Figure 2).
